question: Which American University has collaborated with AIIMS on genetic testing?
explanation: The University of Michigan in partnership with the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) in Delhi and the Kasturba Medical College in Manipal on genetic testing in India. The $2.3 million grant from the National Institute of Health over 5 years will help the University of Michigan and Indian geneticists identify and confirm genetic changes that are the basis of developmental disorders.
